name: UP898620 - Space Movie Asteroids
description:
An asteroid style game but it's based on a popular movie in space.

Created by following the Game Maker Studio 2 tutorial and another one which I found on YouTube which can be found here: 

Used sounds that hold a 'Creative Commons Attribution' license, which can be found at the links below:

Explosion: https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/334266/

Laser: https://freesound.org/people/MusicLegends/sounds/344310/

Player Death: https://freesound.org/people/pumodi/sounds/150204/

Invincibility: https://freesound.org/people/n_audioman/sounds/273566

All artwork was created by me (some by using reference images I found online) with the exception of the star background.
